body: Are you interested in working on a website which has 35 million unique visitors per day? Does the thought of working with Scalable Web Architecture intrigue you? We are now looking for Software Engineers whose hearts beat for clean code and who revel in precision and accuracy. We are expanding our current team because keeping our “baby“ up to date technologically is our primary goal. Moreover, new opportunities are constantly arising within the company, thus current programmers are shifting their responsibilities and new positions open up. This is where you come in!We are a Live video streaming company in the capital of Luxembourg and we are the #1 in the live streaming industry.
